channel.title: Books-and-Events on hey.paris
channel.description: Recent content in Books-and-Events on hey.paris

item.title: Events
item.description: ⚠️ I’m happy to speak at events on a range of topics, including game development and design, artifical intelligence, the intersection and implications of technology and creativity, space, technology, and beyond. Email me at paris AT paris.id.au to chat. Upcoming Events 2024 Speaking: West Coast Space Show 2024, Tasmania, Australia Speaking: NZGDC 2024, Wellington, New Zealand Session: Let’s learn to write narrative games with Yarn Spinner Speaking: It Takes a Spark!

item.title: Publications
item.description: Books Unity Development Cookbook Second Edition English: Unity Development Cookbook Second Edition (O’Reilly Media, 2023) Practical Simulations for Machine Learning English: Practical Simulations for Machine Learning (O’Reilly Media, 2022) Chinese: 機器學習模擬應用｜將合成資料運用於AI (Gotop Information, 2022) Head First Swift English: Head First Swift (O’Reilly Media, 2021) Chinese: 深入淺出Swift程式設計 (Gotop Information, 2022) Unity Game Development Cookbook (First Edition) English: Unity Game Development Cookbook (First Edition) (O’Reilly Media, 2019) Practical Artificial Intelligence with Swift
